"Accompanying survey towards the extreme:
"I have been waiting.
I have heard of this mission that can accomplish
high level training, at a higher level compared to the
previous training which you came along with me.
Do you already have this experience?
I would also like to participate by all means, but
would you like to come along with me, I wonder?

*Clear, travelling only with Aris"

"Extreme Pass
*3 pieces per account granted at time of order"

"待ってたわ。
この間付き合ってもらった演習よりも
高度な訓練のできる任務があると
耳にしたのよ。
貴方も既に経験済み？
私もぜひ参加してみたいのだけれども
一緒に来てもらえないかしら？

※アリスのみ同行でクリア"
